title: build: darwin/amd64 builder is sick
body:
We kind of need the darwin/amd64 builder to tell us the release is OK before cutting Go 1.7 beta. Lots of us run on laptops so it's maybe OK to test there explicitly, but a builder would be nice. What happened to it?

Maybe one of @crawshaw @evandbrown @hyangah @bradfitz knows.
